page.title: 01A General Introduction
page.content: Hartwell is a small village that is set in a {farming landscape}.Near the village is the ancient Salcey Forest. The villages of Hartwell,Ashton and Roade each have general stores and Post Offices and Hartwell has a surprising number of other wharehouses selling office and home furniture and pet food supplies.There are few facilities in either Ashton or Hartwell,the latter has a lot of new housing and this has lead to vandalism problems.Hartwell has only occupied the present site since the early 19th century.Aerial photos show evidence of forest settlements in many places from Neolithic times on.The roads leading to the villages are poor and cause many accidents in winter.This makes {transport} difficult and costly for residents. Andrew Hunter,11.
